abilities.name: Avoidance.
abilities.description: If the demilich is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

abilities.name: Legendary Resistance
abilities.description: If the demilich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

abilities.name: Turn Immunity.
abilities.description: The demilich is immune to effects that turn undead.
